divs: Sighting Detailsi drove to a location in the mountains to commit suicide ,when i got there i got out of the vehicle and walked around it looking at my surroundings as to make sure nobody was watching me while i committed suicide.afteer about ten to 15 minutes of making peace with it and saying goodbye etc...i was now ready and as i was no more than ten seconds away from pulling the trigger ,i noticed something move out of the corner of my eye ...it upset me because i thought them to be people watching ,but when i looked at them there were two both stood facing me one motionless and the other one leaning back into a strait stance ,was leaning just enough into my periphrial vision that i would see them.they were exactly like the small greys you see like in the roswell accident .this wasn't a terrifying experience .But i also realized just recently after 20 years since the sighting ,that when i went up there to commit suicide it was early,about noon when i ten seconds away from commiting suicide and saw the greys and left it was 11:30pm and there was a full moon thats how i remember seeing them was in the well lit moonlight .it took years for me to actually accept what i saw with my own eyes...and there is not doubt whatsoever 100 % absolutely positively beyond any doubt ...that i saw them 2..twenty feet away from me ,i even had a loaded gun and couldve shot at them and probibly hit them i had a 357 magnum loaded with the trigger pulled back and ready to fire,when i noticed that i was not alone it simply voided the suicide and i left ,which i thank them for really.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Lake Isabella
There were no other sightings in Lake Isabella on or around April 10th 1992
Summary: was going to committ suicide and was interupted
